title: 2.1 Modern Cloud Integration Platforms
body_html:
Modern Cloud Integration Platforms

Introduction to Cloud Integration

Modern enterprises increasingly rely on cloud platforms for their integration needs. This chapter explores the leading cloud integration platforms and their capabilities in creating seamless, scalable integration solutions.

  • AWS AppFlow
  • Amazon EventBridge
  • AWS Step Functions
  • Amazon MQ
  • AWS Lambda

Microsoft Azure

  • Azure Integration Services
  • Logic Apps
  • Service Bus
  • API Management
  • Azure Functions

Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

  • Cloud Pub/Sub
  • Cloud Functions
  • Apigee
  • Cloud Endpoints
  • Workflows

Key Players

  • MuleSoft
  • Dell Boomi
  • Informatica
  • SnapLogic
  • Workato

Features

  • Real-time monitoring

  • Version control

Conclusion

Cloud integration platforms continue to evolve, offering increasingly sophisticated tools for building modern, scalable integration solutions. Understanding these platforms and their capabilities is crucial for designing effective integration architectures in today's cloud-first world.
